content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: leather_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "leather", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 43, "index": 17}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "turtle_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 22}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 60, "index": 24}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 27, "index": 34}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 55, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a leather helmet, I need to move 5 leather into the crafting table. I will start by moving the leather at slot 14 into the crafting table at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
